Blog.post: hi ya'll this is weird but im sure i will get used to it. sooo... school is alomst out thank the fucking lord my god im so tired of dealing wiht the damn teachers. so alex from michigan is coming to cali yippi (not) and she is going to be comming to school with me the last week of school oh joy! well i gonna go bye ya'll

hey guys yeah tomorrow we get out yearbooks and next friday i am leaving to go to washington im soooooooooooo excited yeha anyways my history teacher is being a butt and i have an F in the class bc i only have 1722 points and i need like 2000 more to get atleast a c well i dunno what to do ! anyways im like failing all me classes and i owe my english teacher 75 cents for not covering my book and i almost had to pay 90 bucks for my lost lit book but i fixed tha tby changing the number on my book the number i am supossed to have lol ok well anyways i guess i am going to go so i will talk to ya'll later k bye
hey peeps whats up!!!!!!!!!! i have nothing else to say soo yeah

hey!yo! I'm soooo not ghetto... I haven't decided whether it's even totally possible to be fully ghetto here in WC. Anyways Kayla, I'm hellsa excited for you even though I'm not going. I will miss you and I love you!!! Briana I hope you have fun to! I have officially decided that dead week does NOT exist!! It is full of nothing but presentations, projects, essays and cramming for the finals...does anyone agree? If anyone wants to be able to post email me or Kayla. That's all for now.... Asta!

hey guys, its me again yeah i forgot to save the other one i just wrote so i have to write the whole fucking thing over again lol! yeha i cannot believe that we get out of school next week i am so excited because next friday i am going to WASHINGTON to see my sister i am soo excited because i have not seen her in a really long time like 3 or 4 years. i will be leaving with,me,briana,anne, and my freaky dog molly!!! lol on the 11 and coming back the 27 so i will see u lindsay when i get home thank god alex's is not comming until next year LOL!!! yeha and this week on friday we get out YEARBOOKS!!!!! yeha i am excited about hat also well im going to go ttya'll later.

i am so gald that we only have 2 weeks left of school ans that we have a 3 day weekend i cannot wait until school is out especially since i ma going ot washington state the day w get out of school. OMG we get yearbooks on friday i am sooooo excited!!!!!. well i did nto do much of anything this weekend except for 2day i went clothes SHOPPING yea I LOVE SHOPPING.!!!

hey OMG i am soooo excited for tomorrow because me, briana, anne and molly are going to washington for 2 weeks and anne is only going for one but oh well still it is going to be sooo much fucking fun. tomorrow is the last day of school and me and briana get out at 10:00 here is the agenda lindsay if u need to know where i am her we go! 10:00 get out of school 10:20 leave school to go pick up brianas shit at her house 10:30 go home and pack up the car including molly 11:00 hopefully get on the raod 7:00pm get to bend oregon, eat dinner,sleep 9:00am get up 10:00 eat breakfast 10:15 go shopping in the outlet malls in bend 12:00pm get o nteh raod drive to pasco 5:00 or 6:00 get to grandmas house eat dinner and then go back to trinas house and sleep!!!! contact information grandma- 1-509-547-8589 trina-1-509-547-2360 my cell-1-925-330-8757 that is where u can contact me if you REALLY need to love ya'll see u when i get bakc home on the 27 of june!!!! have a super summer and a wonderful 2 weeks without me LOL!
urlLink the dead fish Posted by urlLink Hello

Hey! Is anyone else feeling swamped?? Today I have a swim meet from 7:30 until 12 and I have been in my room cleaning any studying since then...grrrr... I want to do anything else but I know if I don't study and get my shit done it'll bite me in the ass later! lol... So yeah, oh my gosh, I thought the yearbooks would be sooo much better this year. I mean, there's some cool stuff in them but I dunno, for me there wasn't a good enough product for time time and di nero put into it. Whats with calling it the "Manual"? Why change the name of the "yearbook" now? Is Las Lomas trying to start a new fad or what? Anyways, not like anyone cares but I liked the freshman year yearbooks the best (the black ones with the collage on the side and all the quotes). It had a lot more room for everyone... not just the leadership people... The nerds like us need room too...lol...OK well I g2g finish cleaning and go to sleep or I won't get that Superculminating Poster done... I need to study some too... nighty night PS for anyone who cares Cole is sick....

Sorry for not being as faithful to this thing as I swore I would.... I have had a lot of things goin down... Swimming and many others... When Kayla comes back this will get better... WELCOME HOME in a few days!!! Asta!
Hola! With Kayla gone there is not much to say here...so HI and yeah... bye
